articleContent:
Dear Rovers,
 
Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "All Silent Souls Can Sing" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 16 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more!
 
Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!
 
Proceed to submit: https://forms.gle/MSoxanKBc6LFuRos6
 
 
Content Requirement
 
Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 2.0 "All Silent Souls Can Sing"!
 
Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!
 
 
How to Submit
 
  1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.
 
  1. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.
 
*Please quote your post link with the right hashtags published publicly on the designated platforms.
 
Submission form: https://forms.gle/MSoxanKBc6LFuRos6
articleTitle: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "All Silent Souls Can Sing" is now live!
